attributes.action: Make the British national anthem compulsory in all schools across England.
attributes.background: This will help students be proud of the country there from and feel part of the family.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we're not sure whether you want it to be compulsory for school students to be taught the words of the national anthem or for them to sing the national anthem at school.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
